DRAFTS: A current of air, usually coming into a room or vehicle.
INBOX: A container in which papers to be dealt with are put.
SENT: A subdivision of currency, equal to one hundredth of an Estonian kroon.
SNOOZED: To sleep, especially briefly; to nap, doze.
STARRED: To appear as a featured performer or headliner, especially in an entertainment program.
TRASH: Useless things to be discarded; rubbish; refuse.
